local_intent: Verify successful approach and alignment to the T-block before orientation and push.
assumptions: IsAt(t_block) is used as a proxy to confirm the end-effector has approached and aligned with the block.
coherence_with_global: Respects the global flow: perceive (DetectObject fallback) → approach/align (ApproachAndAlign with retries) → verify (IsAt). Leaves yaw-setting and push to subsequent global steps.
